author: Matt Cole
title: Turnage & Sons strikes balance with 29-truck organic milk-haul fleet
description: After growing to as many as 40 trucks, Robbie Turnage discovered that he's better suited to keep the fleet size just shy of 30 trucks to ensure his equipment, drivers and customers are taken care of.
content:
